Omiscid::Factory

Omiscid::Factory Class Reference
[User friendly high-level API for Omiscid, Layer 2 : Omiscid multiplateform Service Control layer.]

High level user friendly class to create Omiscid services. More...

#include <ServiceControl/Factory.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static Service * Create (const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString ClassName=Service::DefaultServiceClassName)
static Service * CreateFromXML (SimpleString XmlDesc)

Detailed Description

High level user friendly class to create Omiscid services.

This class is used to create a service. One have to invoque static function Factory::Create(const SimpleString ServiceName) of Factory::CreateFromXML(SimpleString XmlDesc) directly using "Factory::Create..." or "ServiceFactory.Create..." syntax. Factory::CreateFromXML is not accessible yet (under work).

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Definition at line 30 of file Factory.h.

Member Function Documentation

Service * Factory::Create (  const SimpleString  ServiceName,
const SimpleString  ClassName = Service::DefaultServiceClassName
)  [static]
 

Create a new Omiscid service. This service will not be advertised in DSN-SD until the Service::Start method is called.

Parameters:
ServiceName the name of the service as it will appear in DNS-SD (maybe suffixed by a number automatically added).
ClassName The classe name of this service. Can be usefull in order to search for services. By default, class is Service.
Returns:
the Omiscid service. All access to the service will be through this object
